name: MySQL
short_description: MySQL is an open source database that supports scalable web-based and embedded database applications.
overview: Serving as the "M" in the popular LAMP stack (Linux/Apache/MySQL/PHP), MySQL is an open-source database solution that has been downloaded over 100 million times since its inception.  Its product offerings range from enterprise level support packages, complete with full service support, to free downloads of the latest MySQL versions.  MySQL Version 5 is the most recent offering, with the alpha version of [MySQL 6.0](http://www.mysql.com/mysql60/) currently available for testing.
